name: Cave Glider
description:
This is a submission the Game Jam 167. The theme was "Glide" and I decided to create a riddle themed paperplane game, where you can place various items to get to the goal. It is my first game ever created and I hope you like it. Please give good feedback so i can better myself. 

NOTE!:

Use the mouse to drag the camera to the position you want.

AND important play this game in fullscreenmode so the inventory does not take all the space. Sorry for the inconvenience but i messed up at the build and I dont have that much time for the submission.
